text: Catherine Kellner (born October 2, 1970) is an American character actress, perhaps best known for appearing in Daft Punk's music-video for their song Da Funk. Kellner was born in Manhattan, New York to a psychologist/photographer mother and a squash player/Greek classics scholar father who was a Hungarian immigrant. She attended Vassar College, then New York University's Graduate Acting Program at the Tisch School of the Arts, graduating in 1995. Kellner lives in New York City. and is married to Reuben Avery, a photographer and computer programmer, and has a son Ewen Joseph Avery. Her parents are George and Martha Kellner, who, in May 1970, survived the crash of ALM Flight 980 in the Caribbean. Martha Kellner was pregnant with Catherine at the time. ==Filmography== *Road (2005) *Pearl Harbor (2001) *Tully (2000) *The Weight of Water (2000) *Shaft (2000) *30 Days (1999) *200 Cigarettes (1999) *Restless (1998) *Rosewood (1997) *No Way Home (1996) *High Incident (1996) (TV series) *Kicking and Screaming (1995) *Six Degrees of Separation (1993) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:Actresses from New York City Category:American film actresses Category:American television actresses Category:Living people Category:People from Manhattan Category:Tisch School of the Arts alumni Category:Vassar College alumni
title: Catherine Kellner
